abstract.para: This is the Subversion Repository Search Engine Users Guide
This is the users guide to SupoSE to describe how to use and install the Subversion Repository Search Engine.

section.title: Overview
section.para: If you are working a longer time with a Subversion repository there comes the time you want to search for particular information within the repository. For example a file name, a revision or more complex the content of a document (whatever you mean by a document).

listitem.para: SupoSE will be able to scan a single repository or multiple repositories.
SupoSE is able to do the scanning on a scheduled base
SupoSE can combine different indexes into a single or multiple of them.
You can search for contents of documents (PDF, HTML, Word, Excel etc.)
You can search for file names, paths
You can search for tag names, branch names
You can filter particular areas of the repository not to scan (file names, paths, properties etc.)
